entry.title: Stats on compact block reconstructions
entry.summary: The email inquires about the poor reconstruction performance noted on the dates September 6th, 7th, and 8th of 2025, while also acknowledging the commendable work done aside from those specific instances. This inquiry suggests a need to investigate or analyze potential reasons behind the subpar performance during those days, implying that an understanding of the causative factors could contribute to improving future outcomes. The recognition of good work indicates that while there are areas of concern that need addressing, overall efforts are appreciated. This balance between critique and praise encourages a constructive approach to problem-solving and improvement.
